testcase.name: Verify that user can create a survey
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed Then user should create a survey............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that user cannot create a survey without typing title (empty title)
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed And user click the Save Button..............................................passed Then user should not create a survey........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that user can cancel the process by clicking Discard button
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed And user click the Discard Button...........................................passed Then user should cancel the process.........................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that page title is changed to the new survey name after user create the survey
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed And user write any "title" on Title label...................................passed And user click the Save Button..............................................passed Then user should see the page title is changed to the new survey name after user create the survey.passed

testcase.name: Verify that “Survey created” message is displayed at the bottom of the page (after creating a new survey).
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed And user write any "title" on Title label...................................passed And user click the Save Button..............................................passed Then user should see Survey created message is displayed at the bottom of the page (after creating a new survey).passed

testcase.name: Verify that user can find the new created survey under permanent survey list by using search box.
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Create Button...........................................passed And user write any "title" on Title label...................................passed And user click the Save Button..............................................passed And user click the List button..............................................passed And user write new created "title" under permanent survey list by using search box..passed Then user should find the new created survey................................passed

testcase.name: Verify that user can change surveys display to Kanban
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the Kanban button...........................................passed Then user should see the data like as Kanban type...........................passed

testcase.name: Verify that user can change surveys display to List
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the List button.............................................passed Then user should see the data like as List type.............................passed

testcase.name: Verify that the number of surveys increased 1
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the surveys module page of web table app...................passed When user click the List button.............................................passed And user click the Create Button............................................passed And user write any "title" on Title label...................................passed And user click the Save Button..............................................passed Then user should see the number of surveys increased 1......................passed
